name: Escaping Chaos
description:
Your main goal is to go up, while destroying as many platforms as you can. But watch out for chaos and explosions constantly chasing you. Good luck!

Use:
- arrow keys to move,
- ASD to shoot
- W to create platform

Every destroyed platform grants you one point.

Game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021 under theme "Let there be chaos"

I used assets made by:
@o_lobster
@ansimuz
@Tallbeard Studios
